spec_data.Name: texlive-kotex-plain
spec_data.Description:
The package provides macros for typesetting Hangul, the native
alphabet of the Korean language, using plain *TeX. Input Korean
text should be encoded in UTF-8. The package is belongs to the
ko.TeX bundle.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 07:45:07 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Macros for typesetting Korean under Plain TeX
